resposta: <British Satellite Broadcasting (BSB) started broadcasting on 25 March 1990.

British Sky Broadcasting (BSK) operates two main satellites along with a satellite channel. They broadcast on three major platforms including the European Space Agency, the United Nations, and the International Space Station.
BSB has three main satellite channels operating across multiple platforms including the European Space Agency, the United Nations, and the International Space Station.

British Sky Broadcasting (BSK) now operates two main satellite channels and a satellite channel for its international operations, including the European Space Agency, the United Nations, and the International Space Station.
